 Description:

 New role-playing game from Spiders Studio will throw you in the epicenter of the heroic and desperate opposition , the Alliance now inexorably losing ground under the onslaught of the army of the dead.
 From a distant icy strongholds High Warlock now run across the continent , ruthlessly suppressing any resistance . When extinguished the last hope , that you will elect the fire demon as a carrier of its strength ...
